scripts.install: env-cmd -e webpack_prod webpack --env.production --config config/webpack.config.js; env-cmd -e webpack_dev webpack --env.development --config config/webpack.config.js
scripts.dev: env-cmd -e development pm2 start config/pm2.config.js --only {{name}} --env development --no-daemon
scripts.dev_debug: env-cmd -e development_debug pm2 start config/pm2.config.js --only {{name}} --env development --no-daemon
scripts.prod: env-cmd -e production pm2 start config/pm2.config.js --env production
scripts.examples: env-cmd -e development pm2 start config/pm2.config.js --only examples --env development --no-daemon
scripts.webpack: env-cmd -e webpack_prod webpack --env.production --config config/webpack.config.js; env-cmd -e webpack_dev webpack --env.development --verbose --config config/webpack.config.js
